comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x: number of orders of matcha ice cream
- y: number of orders of orange sorbet

Extracted Constraints:
- 2x + 4y \leq 600 (Ice cream constraint)
- 4x + 3y \leq 550 (Water constraint)
- x \geq 0 (Non-negativity constraint)
- y \geq 0 (Non-negativity constraint)
- x \geq 0.15(x + y) (At least 15% of desserts made must be matcha ice cream)

Extracted Objective:
- Minimize Z = 2x + 4y (Total amount of flavouring needed)
